page.title: 19The year 1945 remembered (2)
page.content: rabbits and he used to catch fish but he never used to sell them- he used to catch them for us to eat.Rabbit stew was lovely, and roast rabbit.... When victory came it wasn't Oh how lovely we can eat all the sweets now and all the chocolate and stuff like that because it just wasn't in the shops. {Did you travel? Travel. We were lucky if we ever got out of the village, or I was but I wasn't very rich and if I went to Buckfastleigh, oh dear it was a high day and many a time we walked it from S Brent along the back road. The sea- side was not on because just after the war there was still barbed wire all over the beaches- we were just not allowed on the beaches.
